meanings.definition: The quality or state of being aggregated.
meanings.sent1: The aggregateness of the data made it easier to analyze.
meanings.sent2: The aggregateness of the rocks formed a solid wall.
meanings.sent3: The aggregateness of the puzzle pieces created a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The aggregateness of the team's efforts led to a successful project.
meanings.sent5: The aggregateness of the ingredients in the recipe made it delicious.

meanings.definition: The act or process of aggregating.
meanings.sent1: The aggregateness of the information gathering was crucial for the report.
meanings.sent2: The aggregateness of the votes determined the election outcome.
meanings.sent3: The aggregateness of the ants working together was impressive.
meanings.sent4: The aggregateness of the students in the classroom made for a lively discussion.
meanings.sent5: The aggregateness of the clouds signaled an incoming storm.

meanings.definition: The result of combining separate elements into a whole.
meanings.sent1: The aggregateness of the colors in the painting created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The aggregateness of the ingredients in the dish made it flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The aggregateness of the flowers in the bouquet brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The aggregateness of the voices in the choir produced a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The aggregateness of the players' skills led to a winning team.
